Text: couple thingseverything is going as well as could be expected First I wanted to ask you for a favor in that we are basically short to you mw of cal cob light and and mw of cob light Cob is such a thin market and I was hoping you might be able to help us out on counterparties who might have offsetting positions I could bookout with Second we are going to be looking to expand at the beginnning of our credit is good with just about everyone now and we will be looking to hire one or two experienced people to trade the west especially one long term guy Were obviously not as big as some shops but we have a very aggressive bonus payout Anyway something to keep in mind once things get more settled up there for you guys Thanks to you and Bob for the help yesterday booking some of this stuff out Eric Strickland Mieco Inc

RE A voice of the peoplepictured you as more of a democrat I thought maybe you worked on some of Gores campaigns in Tennessee Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November AM To Subject FW A voice of the people Forwarded by Kim WardHOUECT on AM Everyone that wants genuine justice What can we do I wish more But at a minimum please write to the below Also PLEASE take a minute to call the White House and leave a message on their public opinion board at And call Kay Bailey Hutchison at AND We cannot stand by and watch this happen At a MINIMUM we can do this Happy Thanksgiving everyone We do have so very much to be thankful for Stacy And dear Schulk pleeease send this out to your zillionpeople distribution list thank you so much hope you toe is healing and youve peeled the Saturn sticker off the teles already Stacy Repult Vice President Finance Cinemark International LLC phone fax Forward Header Subject A voice of the people Author Stacy Repult Date PM Dear Mr Gore I am completely appalled at your behavior in all your on behalf of the people efforts The people have spoken and been counted twice by a computerized process Now you have fought to pick and select certain counties in which to hand count and further allow the people to have a voice The voice you want to hear can be created through your legal manipulations which by the way you learned well through your boss over these past few years great job on copying his character sir But the genuine voice of the people has already been heard And since it wasnt the voice YOU wanted to hear now is being overruled by your political ploys I have always been so proud of America Ive lived overseas for graduate work and travel frequently overseas for the work I do But now sir I am ashamed You have shown complete lack of integrity and character You do not care sir about this country You clearly care much more about your obtaining this office You do not care sir about the voice of the people but rather that the right voices be heard and all others squelched I am ashamed of you and find this completely a disgrace to the office you are so bitterly and petulantly fighting for and a disgrace to the nation Our America was built on integrity character and honor You sir have gutted that foundation Do you recall the phrase Gods Country it still is sir And you someday will have to discuss this with Him directly He also favors truth and justice And Im not sure your attorneys will be available to help you rewrite His definitions quite as well as youve rewritten Americas Mr Gore you are NOT a man to lead this country And youve proven that so very clearly in your actions over this election Shame on you sir And thats a voice of the people for you Stacy Repult Vice President Finance Cinemark International LLC phone fax The information in this email and in any attachments is confidential and intended solely for the attention and use of the named addressees This information may be subject to legal professional or other privilege or may otherwise be protected by work product immunity or other legal rules It must not be disclosed to any person without the senders authority If you are not the intended recipient or are not authorized to receive it for the intended recipient you are not authorized to and must not disclose copy distribute or retain this message or any part of it If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by email and delete the original message

REclosest airport to long beach is long beach you can get a direct flight im sure let me know i still need to buy you dinner and let you spill all your knowledge of the gas market Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Subject Hey where is the closest airport to Long Beach May be in town on april th Trying to get from San Jose to Long Beach

REforgot i have a broker from bloomberg in town the same night so if its cool with you then dinner is on him im going to make reservations for at ivy on the shore Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Subject RE What is the next closest airport No direct flights from San Jose I think dinner at Ivy on the Shore is in order I will tell me boss Barry he is out of luck and on his own

ANSIXQREFwAnIrishWishFk thanks i could use all of the luck that i can get right now trading this market i have heard so many rumors about whats going on over there that my head is spinning i wont bombard you with questions though hows everything going other than work any opinions on this gas market you are supposed to be my gas guru i thought i would have heard from you a week ago telling me to buy it that it was going to make this huge move maybe the email got lost went to florida this weekend for the gafla game and once again left disappointed anyway hope all is well let me know if youre going to be out this way anytime soon my nov trip might be cancelled now ill tell you more about all the crap going on over here next time i see you E

ANSIXQREFwAnIrishWishFWow sorry to hear about all that i didnt even know you were dating someone i am way out of the loop whoever he was is obviously a fucking idiot ive told you before my opinions of you and ill tell you again anytime you do have a lot going on but look at it this way it can only get better from here i might still try and come to houston just not sure will let you know hope everything gets better for you E Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October AM To Subject RE Fw An Irish Wish Funny you should ask about my life right now Now you are sure to get an earful Beware My country is at war and going into a major recession my company is falling down around my feet my grandmother is sick I am broke and my boyfriend broke up with me last week further confirming my ability to fail when it comes to relationships I know I act tought when it comes to this stuff but I am really sad about this one I guess that I am not sick and I do have lots of friends But I am tired and need someone to take over at this point I cant believe that you didnt get my email about gas being a buy a couple of weeks ago I guess if I had seen you when I was there I could have told you in person AS for business over here gas and power trading is still going strong However all of the events have affected us in a huge way financially Down to whether we get bonuses or not It is not going to be a good year just trying to stay strong but I think that we will survive and mostly thanks to EnronOnline Curious about whats going on there since you mentioned it Anyway sorry to burden you with my personal problems I do hope things are going ok for you too bad youre not going to make it here As we are in a cash crunch I think I am probobly grounded for the remainder of the year Who knows Keep in touch K Original Message From Eric Strickland ENRON Sent Monday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject RE Fw An Irish Wish k thanks i could use all of the luck that i can get right now trading this market i have heard so many rumors about whats going on over there that my head is spinning i wont bombard you with questions though hows everything going other than work any opinions on this gas market you are supposed to be my gas guru i thought i would have heard from you a week ago telling me to buy it that it was going to make this huge move maybe the email got lost went to florida this weekend for the gafla game and once again left disappointed anyway hope all is well let me know if youre going to be out this way anytime soon my nov trip might be cancelled now ill tell you more about all the crap going on over here next time i see you E This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the REi finished and it was still light out ill just leave it at that i was sick all last week and still am so i was having a really hard time catching my breath i did finish though went to a great restaurant el gaucho i was surprised that i had never been there on business the steak was excellent leaving for cda a week from tomorrow coming back friday night or saturday morning undecided as of right now as far as it being beneficial for you to go is it beneficial for me to go to these trips who knows but i go because its fun and its free i plan on playing a lot of golf and hitting the spa frequently you should definitely go im sure its been a week or so since your last vacation let me know what you decide it would be good to see you especially the week after the big ugaut game E Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Monday October AM To Eric Strickland Email Subject How was the marathon How long did it take you to finish When are you going to Ceour dAlene Do you think it would be beneficial for me to show up K This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

RE Change of Control Provisionsat least he appears to have a twinge of guilt for what he should probably be in jail for have you seen all the stock he sold this year how are things going to dynegy Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Wednesday November AM To Eric Strickland Email Harriet Turk Email Jerry Ward Email John Schilke Email Mary Beer Ellen Email Melissa Reese Email Mike Wardell Email Tricia Tlapek Email Subject FW Change of Control Provisions Quite commendable I have to say Original Message From Ken Lay Office of the Chairman Sent Tuesday November PM To DLGAallenronworldwide Subject Change of Control Provisions As many of you know I have a provision in my employment contract which provides for a payment of million per year for the remaining term of my contract in the event of a change of control of Enron The merger with Dynegy or a similar transaction with any other company would trigger this provision on closing Assuming the merger with Dynegy is closed within months as we expect this provision would entitle me to total payments of slightly more than million Many CEOs have change of control provisions in their employment contracts and mine has been in place since But given the current circumstances facing the company and our employees I have been giving a lot of thought these last few days to what to do about this payment Initially I thought I would use part of the funds for a foundation for our employees and take the remainder in stock and cash However after talking to a number of employees this afternoon I have decided that the best course of action would be for me to waive my right to any of this payment Therefore at closing I will receive no payments under this provision I know this action does not remedy the uncertainty that you and your families face But please know that I will continue to do everything in my power to serve the best interests of Enrons employees and shareholders I am still very proud of what we have built at Enron and I want to continue working with all of you to correct the problems and restore Enron to its rightful place in the energy industry Thank you This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

REyou are such a pain in the ass our reservation is for and they said they will do their best to get us on the patio or as close to any rock star as possible Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April PM To Subject RE E Make sure the reservations are for the ocean blvd patio side not the patio in the back I hope this is not too much trouble We want to sit with the rock stars Thanks Kim Eric Strickland on AM To cc Subject RE we had a great time ed knows a lot about wine and took us to a lot of boutique wineries where we were in the proprietors houses hanging out drinking wine with them it was awesome my favorites were pride mountain paloma and guilliams they are all very small but make incredible wines the place we stayed was nice nothing great we ate at La Trevigne napa valley grille and bouchon they were all very good la trevigne was by far the best though had a lot of fun ill pick you up thursday are you checking any bags Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April AM To Subject RE That would be cool I get in at pm on United from San Jose So how was napa I think that I need a napa trip sometime this year How was the place you stayed and where did you eat Did you buy any good wines What was your favorite Eric Strickland on AM To cc Subject RE if you want i can just pick you up at the airport and take you to dinner from there i have to go right by the airport on my way to santa monica i think my teeth are still purple from all the wine i drank this weekend Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE what is the closest airport to ivy on the shore and what is a good hotel Eric Strickland on AM To cc Subject RE i forgot i have a broker from bloomberg in town the same night so if its cool with you then dinner is on him im going to make reservations for at ivy on the shore Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April AM To Subject RE What is the next closest airport No direct flights from San Jose I think dinner at Ivy on the Shore is in order I will tell me boss Barry he is out of luck and on his own

REthat is too weird i had just started typing an email to you when i received this from you glad you enjoyed the wine although you were supposed to wait for me to come to houston to drink it not much new here i have just been spending what seems like every spare minute on the beach lately and it makes it really difficult to come to work this weekend was awesome perfect weather great waves etc im taking some surfing lessons next weekend looking forward to that been trying to be more active in the market lately still cant deal with you guys which costs me every day supposedly it will be worked out soon we can deal in gas now just not in power this marathon that im running in portland next month is headquartered in the hilton downtown is the heathman the best place to stay in that area or should i try somewhere else i stayed at the heathman last time and it was ok making reservations right now for coer dalene do i want a west facing suite looking out at the lake when it gets closer to time youll have to tell me what to get at the spa i plan on playing golf and getting massages and doing little else i probably wont see a soul from the conference except on the golf course i still am waiting to hear from you when a good time would be to come to houston when you were on your trip did you find a good island where i could go and no one could ever find me and i could sit on the beach for the rest of my life drinking pacificos it seems like every day that goes by i come closer to doing itanyways hope all is well there let me know whats going on with you and what fabulous vacation youre going on next E Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston mailtoKim NRONcom Sent Monday August AM To Eric Strickland Email Subject Drank the wine you sent me this weekend It was really good
